articles.title: Kepa the hero as Chelsea edge out Villarreal to win Super Cup - SuperSport
articles.description: Kepa Arrizabalaga was the unlikely hero as Chelsea started the new season as they ended the last with a European trophy by beating Villarreal 6-5 on penalties after a 1-1 draw.

articles.author: David Chau
articles.title: ASX near record highs, as Telstra, AMP and AGL report earnings after 'challenging year' - ABC News
articles.description: Stocks in Australia, Europe and Wall Street are trading at record highs, after the latest US consumer price figures showed inflation was not 'out of control', as investors had feared, while Telstra, AMP and AGL report how they performed in the past year.
articles.content:
The Australian share market has wiped out much of its early gains, but is still hovering close to record high levels.
By 12:10pm AEST, the benchmark ASX 200 was flat 7,585. It had climbed as high as… [+9904 chars]

articles.author: Rory Sullivan
articles.title: Sicily sees highest-ever temperature recorded in Europe - The Independent
articles.description: Temperature of 48.8C in Syracuse beats previous record from Athens in 1977
articles.content:
A city in Sicily has recorded Europes hottest-ever temperature, meteorologists have said.
Syracuse, located on the islands south-east coast, saw the mercury rise to 48.8C on Wednesday, according to … [+2273 chars]
